message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $12000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a significant discount. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product while providing you with substantial savings. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
